alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Chickasaw; Pontotoc (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 03 at 4:47PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Chickasaw, northeastern Calhoun and southern Pontotoc Counties through 515 PM CDT... At 447 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Vardaman, or 11 miles northwest of Houston, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Houston, Bruce, Calhoun City, Vardaman, Derma, Pittsboro, Pyland, Trebloc, Houlka, New Houlka, Robbs, Thorn, Van Vleet, Parkersburg, Reid, Loyd, Thelma, Tabbville, Matthews and McCondy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
